stringVals: If freezing is ignored, spells such as Entangle and Ice Barrage will not prevent their targets from moving. Damage dealt by the spells will be applied normally.
In single-way combat areas, the PJ timer prevents players from being attacked for 10 secs after they have been attacking someone else.
If Single Spells is enabled, multi-target attacks (such as chinchompas) will hit only one target, even in multi-way combat areas.
Should the Trident of the Seas be able to cast its spell on players? Normally it works only against monsters.
